{"id":905159604,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1677393451,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/905159604/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"42.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    private String word1, word2;\n    private int n1, n2;\n    private int[][] dp;\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n        this.word1 = word1;\n        this.word2 = word2;\n        n1 = word1.length();\n        n2 = word2.length();\n        dp = new int[n1][n2];\n        for(int i=0;i<n1;i++)\n            for(int j=0; j<n2; j++)\n                dp[i][j] = -1;\n\n        return getAns(0,0);\n    }\n\n    private int getAns(int i, int j){\n        if(i>=n1){//insert\n            return n2-j;\n        }\n        if(j>=n2){//delete\n            return n1-i;\n        }\n        \n        if(dp[i][j] != -1) return dp[i][j];\n\n        if(word1.charAt(i)==word2.charAt(j)){\n            dp[i][j] = getAns(i+1,j+1);\n        }\n        else{\n            dp[i][j] = 1 + Math.min(\n                Math.min(\n                    getAns(i,j+1),\n                    getAns(i+1,j)\n                ),\n                getAns(i+1,j+1)\n            );\n        }\n        return dp[i][j];\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false}
